content:
Considering the Target Audience and Information about myself, give me a topic outline for the heading “Understanding Progress Payments: A Guide for Homeowners Under the HIA Contract”. The article should appeal to the Target Audience who is building a new build or renovation of the residential home. There should be analysis of latent conditions commonly found in new builds vs renovations. I also want you to maintain a word count of 1,300 words. I want you to incorporate the following longtail keywords in the outline: 
“Clause 21 HIA Contract”
“Practical Completion”
“What is Practical Completion”
“What does practical completion mean”
“How long does practical completion stage take”
“When is practical completion achieved”
“Handover”
“HIA Contracts”
“Define practical”
“HIA building contract”
“What is Practical Completion?”
“When is a Construction Project Practically complete?”
“Notice of Practical Completion”
“Practical Completion vs. Final Completion”
“HIA contract Practical Completion”
